channel.title: My run flash when i open
channel.description: hi guys,well here is the problem i have a client and i need to run it (ovo ) to play is but every time i hit "run with GUI" it just flashes here is what is inside it[code]@ECHO OFF color 77 title server name here echo Running elementalscape JAVA -Xmx500m client[/code]
